mapper.select: select la.id, la.lease_start_date, la.lease_end_date, la.rent, la.status lease_status, la.source_type, ri.room_number, ai.name apartment_name, gi.name, gi.url, -- 此处判断是否可以续约，租约处于已签约且已签约的数量为1条并且没有续约待确定的 if(status = 2 and cnt.signed = 1 and cnt.renewing = 0, true, false) is_renewable from lease_agreement la left join room_info ri on la.room_id = ri.id and ri.is_deleted = 0 left join apartment_info ai on la.apartment_id = ai.id and ai.is_deleted = 0 left join graph_info gi on ri.id = gi.item_id and gi.item_type = 2 and gi.is_deleted = 0 left join ( select sum(if(status = 2, 1, 0)) signed, sum(if(status = 7, 1, 0)) renewing from lease_agreement where is_deleted = 0 and phone = #{phone} ) cnt on true order by la.create_time desc
